sentences.en: "Nice meeting you, Zoe," I said and slid off.
sentences.cn: “很高兴见到你，佐薇，”说完我便溜走了。

sentences.en: From that it followed logically that he would not be meeting Hildegarde.
sentences.cn: 由此，他不去见希尔德加德便是顺理成章的事了。

sentences.en: He was having a grand time meeting new sorts of people.
sentences.cn: 结识形形色色的人让他很开心。

sentences.en: He was not displeased at the way he had handled the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他对他主持会议的方式并无不满。

sentences.en: I had felt drawn to Alice ever since our first meeting.
sentences.cn: 我第一次见到艾丽斯就感觉被她吸引住了

sentences.en: I wrote back to Meudon at once to fix up a meeting.
sentences.cn: 我马上给缪顿回信安排会面。

sentences.en: I've got to rush. Got a meeting in a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 我得赶紧走了。几分钟后要开个会。

sentences.en: NATO defense ministers wrap up their meeting in Brussels today.
sentences.cn: 北约各国国防部长今天圆满结束了在布鲁塞尔的会议。

sentences.en: The aim of this initial meeting is to clarify the issues.
sentences.cn: 本次初步会议的目标是澄清这些问题。

sentences.en: The club has moved its meeting to Saturday, January 22nd.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部已经把会议日期改到1月22号，星期六。

sentences.en: The fiery right-wing leader toned down his militant statements after the meeting.
sentences.cn: 言辞激烈的右翼领袖在会后收敛了他的好战言论。

sentences.en: The meeting between Molotov, Bidault and Bevin was decisive.
sentences.cn: 莫洛托夫、皮杜尔和贝文之间的会晤起到了决定性作用。

sentences.en: The meeting had all the ingredients of high political drama.
sentences.cn: 这次会议具备了作为高度戏剧性的政治事件的一切要素。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister was speaking ahead of today's meeting.
sentences.cn: 首相在今天的会议开始之前作了发言。

sentences.en: To an extent, that is the reason for the meeting.
sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，那就是召开这次会议的原因。

sentences.en: We'll go to a meeting in Birmingham and come straight back.
sentences.cn: 我们将去伯明翰参加会议，然后马上回来。

sentences.en: We’re having a meeting next week to discuss the matter.
sentences.cn: 我们下周将开会讨论此事。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 首脑会议，最高级会议

trans.tran_cn: 会议，聚会，汇合点，运动会
trans.tran_en: an event at which people meet to discuss and decide things

trans.tran_cn: 相遇( meet的现在分词)，相识，开会，接触（某物）
